title: SFEC Form 124 - Contributions Made by Business Entities - Filings
description:
Under San Francisco Campaign & Governmental Conduct Code Section 1.124, any committee required to file campaign statements with the Ethics Commission must disclose certain additional information no later than the deadline for filing semi-annual or pre-election statements any contribution(s) that, in the aggregate, total $10,000 or more from a single business entity in a single election cycle. For the purposes of this disclosure, the committee must disclose one of the business entity’s principal officers, including but not limited to the Chair of the Board of Directors, President, Vice President, CEO, CFO, COO, Executive Director, Deputy Director, or equivalent positions. The committee must also disclose whether, within the 24 months prior to the date the entity’s contributions to the committee totaled $10,000 or more, the business entity received funds through a contract or grant from any City agency for a project within the jurisdiction of the City and County of San Francisco. If such contract or grant exists, the committee must disclose the name of the agency and the value of the contract or grant. For more information visit www.sfethics.org.

Each row on this table represents the contents of a Form 124 filed with the Ethics Commission. There is one sub-tables of information on Form 124: Contracts and Grants. The sub-table is available in a separate dataset: "SFEC Form 124 - Contributions Made by Business Entities - Contracts and Grants" at https://data.sfgov.org/City-Management-and-Ethics/SFEC-Form-124-Contributions-Made-by-Business-Entit/ssx6-3d9r. Join this dataset with the sub-table using the DocuSignID.

columns.name: DocuSign ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the filing, generated automatically by DocuSign

columns.name: Filing Type
columns.description: Is the Filing Original, Amendment, or Supplemental? An Amendment supersedes the Original filing; a Supplemental is a continuation of a filing, indicating more fields were required.

columns.name: Filing URL
columns.description: URL to download PDF copy of the filing

columns.name: Original Filing Date
columns.description: Only used if the Filing Type is Amendment, indicating the date of the Original Filing

columns.name: Amendment Description
columns.description: Reason for amendment description

columns.name: Date Signed
columns.description: Date form signed and filed by filer

columns.name: Signer Name
columns.description: Name of person who signed the form.

columns.name: Contracts and Grants Subtable Query URL
columns.description: URL to query contracts and grants reported on filing. Response is in JSON format.

columns.name: Committee Name
columns.description: Committee is the filer of this form and recipient of contribution(s)

columns.name: FPPC ID
columns.description: Committee FPPC ID number

columns.name: Designated Contact Person
columns.description: Name of committee’s designated contact person

columns.name: Contact Person Phone
columns.description: Phone number of committee’s designated contact person

columns.name: Contact Person Email
columns.description: Email address of committee’s designated contact person (Optional)

columns.name: Business Entity Name
columns.description: Name of business entity who made contribution

columns.name: Principal Officer Name
columns.description: Name of a principal officer for business entity

columns.name: Principal Officer Title
columns.description: Title of principal officer for business entity

columns.name: Business Entity Street Address
columns.description: Business entity’s street name

columns.name: Business Entity City
columns.description: Business entity’s city

columns.name: Business Entity State
columns.description: Business entity’s state

columns.name: Business Entity Zip Code
columns.description: Business entity’s zip code

columns.name: Total Contributions
columns.description: Total cumulative amount of contribution(s) received from business entity during election cycle

columns.name: Date Threshold Reached
columns.description: Date of final payment from business entity that made the cumulative total $10,000 or more

columns.name: Supplemental Check
columns.description: Checkbox indicating a supplemental form for additional contracts is needed
